name: Pandemonium (Ruxaroh, Krobbizoid)
description:
Welcome to the Pandemonium!

Master the surprisingly difficult yet rewarding controls as you weave your two pillars between arrows to catch them in your connecting chain. Earn coins and buy upgrades to survive increasing hectic waves in this hard to master bullet hell.

Play alone - or with a friend.

While designed to be as tricky mind bending movement challenge for one, try tackling the challenges of Pandemonium with a friend to test your communication skill, and possibly also your friendship.

Made in 48 hours.

This game was made by 2 (Find us on twitter @Ruxaroh & @Krobbizoid) in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam. Please excuse and the report any bugs or issues you may find. We welcome your feedback!

Sound Credits

Thanks to the following people for the games sound effects:

snapping-chain by Cosmic Embers www.youtube.com/cosmicembers

repair sound from MrAuralization

UI Confirmation Alert, A3.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.
